message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a steal! I think you'll really love it.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to make a living too. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about we say $155?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I've already compromised a bit. I'm willing to go down to $140, but that's as low as I can go. I need to make a profit, after all!
I understand your concerns about making a profit, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130 again?
Bob, I'm starting to think we're going around in circles! I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you at $137.50. That's the lowest I can go without losing money on this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll meet you halfway between $120 and $137.50. Would you be willing to go down to $128.75?
I'm starting to think we're getting nowhere, Bob! I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll meet you at $135, but that's it. I really need to make a profit on this deal.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll go down to $130, and that's as low as I can go. If you're willing to meet me there, I'll make the deal.
